toast_strong_err: Autentication error. Check your credentials and your electronic card.
toast_login_err: Authentication error. Please try again later
toast_account_err: Invalid account. Use the FBK account for accessing the app.
err_check_location: The current position info cannot be retrieved. Check the geolocation settings and try again.
err_network: The network information cannot be retreived. Please try again later
err_mock_location: Mock location is enabled. Disable this setting before proceeding with checkin.
err_network_mismatch: The current network does not correspond to the FBK network. Please use the FBK network for checkin.
err_location_mismatch: Current position does not match the FBK site. Cannot proceed with checkin operation.
toast_server_err: Problem accessing the data. Please try again later.
notification_text: You have not yet checked in!
label_notifications_enabled: I would like to receive a reminder for my daily checkin
